title: I dreamed that I was a dog running after me in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that dogs were running after me in a dream. Some dreams can have disturbing meanings, so we present in the following lines if I dreamed that dogs were running after me in a dream, according to what the interpreters said. I dreamed that I was a dog running after me in a dream. I dreamed that dogs were running after me in a dream. A dream. It may be a sign of enemies, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of 100 pounds in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of 100 pounds in a dream for a single woman When interpreting 100 pounds in a dream for a single woman, interpreters of interpretations differed in the meaning of one hundred pounds in a dream, so it turns out that the interpretation of 100 pounds in a dream for a married woman is more than just the interpretation of a pregnant woman and an unmarried girl, and this difference exists between the world. In another, according to the nature of the woman and her circumstances, and through this article we will learn about the interpretation of 100 pounds in a dream for a single woman in different countries. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing one hundred pounds in a dream? Ibn Sirin is one of the greatest scholars who explained everything based on the individual’s foundations and convincing knowledge, and for this reason Many people think about it. If a person sees in a dream a hundred pounds, this is evidence that his condition will go away and that God will remove his distress and his condition will change for the better. If a person dreams that he finds a 100-pound banknote, this is evidence that the person will go through a crisis, but it will pass. In a short time, his circumstances will change for the better. If a person sees in a dream an amount of 100 pounds consisting of silver coins, this is evidence that the dreamer will live a luxurious and stable life. If a girl dreams that she borrowed 100 pounds and spends it, this is a warning that she will lose a member of her family. Read also: Interpretation Holding the hand of a lover in a dream for a single woman. What is the interpretation of seeing one hundred pounds in a dream for a single woman? If a single girl sees a dream worth 100 pounds consisting of coins and she loses this amount, this proves that she does not know how to take advantage of the opportunities available to her. If a single girl sees 100 pounds In a dream, this is a sign that she will get a lot of money in the future. If a lonely girl sees in a dream 100 pounds of banknotes, but she loses them or misplaces them, this is a sign that she will lose someone in her life and people close to her because of the problems that will have to be made. She has to face it. If a girl sees that a dream worth 100 pounds consists of coins and she loses this amount, this is a sign that she does not know how to take advantage of the opportunities available to her. Also read: Cutting hair in a dream for a woman. Interpretation of seeing one hundred pounds in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees 100 A pound in a dream, this indicates that she is in dire need of money in her life. If a married woman dreams that she found a hundred pounds, it is good for her to fulfill the desire she longed for. If a married woman sees in a dream that she finds a hundred pounds, this is evidence of... That she will soon become pregnant and give birth to a child, and he will be right with her, God willing. If a married woman dreams that she finds an amount of 100 pounds along the way, this is a sign that she will develop a strong friendship with a man after starting it. If a married woman sees in a dream that she has lost 100 kilograms This means that she will soon go through a financial crisis, but she will overcome it after a while. If a married woman sees him stealing 100 pounds from her husband, this is evidence that her husband is generous and generous with good morals and a stable shared life. Interpretation of seeing a hundred pounds in a dream for a married woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about a deceased giving a bearded fish

preview.html: If he gives the unknown raw fish to the deceased, this indicates that he has gone through a period full of health problems, and God knows best, and through our interpreter site we will describe in detail the vision of the deceased giving the bearded fish in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the deceased giving his beard a fish in a dream for an unmarried girl. The dream of the dead The unknown person who gives a live fish to an unmarried woman indicates her husband who is very close to her. Seeing that the unmarried woman asks the deceased to give her fish indicates her pursuit of money. If the unmarried woman sees the dead person distributing fish and eating to her, this indicates the goodness that is close to her. An unmarried woman who dreams that a deceased person gives her a lot of fish is a sign that her dreams will come true. Seeing a deceased person giving raw fish to an unmarried woman in a dream means that he will get rid of problems. Seeing a small fish from the dead in unmarried women, indicates the problems that she sees in Her life. Seeing a big fish in a dream and asking for it from a dead person is a sign that he has reached his goal. Asking grilled fish from the dead in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will get rid of the conflicts she sees. See also: A married woman’s dream of fishing. Interpretation of seeing a dead person giving his beard fish in a dream for a married woman. If A married woman sees that she is asking for dead fish, this indicates the success of her married life. And a married woman who asks dead people for grilled fish, refers to the struggles she is experiencing. And if she takes a small fish from the dead in her dream, it shows sad things that she will see in her life. And a married woman The woman who sees that the unknown dead man gives her raw fish is interpreted by the goodness that she sees. And the married woman who asks the dead man to give her a fish indicates that she is in great trouble. Seeing that the dead man gives the married woman a live fish interprets the great achievements she has achieved in her life. Seeing that the deceased Giving a live fish in a dream indicates great happiness for her and her family. Seeing that the deceased gives a married woman a live fish is interpreted as a happy occasion very close to her. Interpretation of seeing the deceased giving his beard a fish in a dream about a divorced woman. A divorced woman asking for a dead, live fish indicates her request for marriage. At this time. If she takes some of the dead grilled fish, this indicates health problems that she suffers from in her life. As for seeing the deceased giving fried fish to the divorced woman, this is an indication that he is going through an important function at this time. Seeing the divorced woman looking at the dead person and asking him for fish indicates She is in a difficult situation. The live fish that the dead man gives to the divorced woman is interpreted in terms of the joys he receives. Seeing the dead fish that the deceased offers to the divorced woman is a sign of the difficulties and problems she faces. The divorced woman who believes that the live fish is small and the dead man gives it to her expresses her sadness and extreme deception. Seeing a large live fish in a dream that was given to it by the dead is a sign of abundance of food and nourishment. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving a fish to a bearded and withered man

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing grilled chicken in a dream?

preview.html: Grilled chicken in a dream is one of the most famous and favorite foods for many people, and seeing it in a dream is a good sign that leads to the emergence of some good positive transformations in the life of the dreamer, because it symbolizes feeding righteous children, and a sign of the coming of good deeds and good blessings for the pioneer and his family, and good news for good. . Luck and blessings in both health and money, and the variety of these indicators depends on the social status of the dreamer, in addition to the events he witnessed. Grilled chicken in a dream: A dream about eating the head of a grilled chicken in a dream indicates an imminent end for one of the dreamer’s acquaintances during the coming period, and the person who sees himself in Dreaming about eating a grilled chicken breast from a dream symbolizes the journey with the series. To earn money. When an unmarried young man sees himself in a dream eating a grilled chicken leg, this is a sign of food with a good wife. The dreamer who sees grilled chicken in his dream is a dream that indicates that he will earn a lot of money after putting in more effort and exhaustion over a period of Time.Dreaming about eating rotting grilled chicken is one of the dreams that indicate financial gains by illicit or illicit means, and God knows best. Dreaming that you are eating a good-tasting grilled chicken in a dream indicates the arrival of abundant good things and a sign of abundant nutrition. Grilling chicken in a dream by Ibn Sirin Women The woman who sees grilled chicken in her dream is a dream that indicates that she will live a life full of calm and stability. The woman is in her dream period when she dreams of grilled chicken from the vision that symbolizes the birth of a boy, and seeing grilled chicken in the dream symbolizes the fulfillment of some personal interests in the coming period. When he sees A man has a grilled chicken in his dream. This is a dream that symbolizes committing an immoral and illegal act. Grilled chicken in a dream for individuals. Seeing a grilled chicken in a Virgo girl’s dream symbolizes achieving goals, satisfying desires, and is a sign of abundant livelihood and the arrival of good deeds and abundant money to the dreamer. Seeing grilled chicken in A dream for an unmarried girl symbolizes a good condition and the arrival of good deeds, and if it tastes bad, it means that you hear some bad news, and God knows best. The dreamer who sees grilled chicken in her dream but does not eat it symbolizes the livelihood of a good husband who will make her live happily and contentedly. A dream about chicken symbolizes Grilled meat in a Virgo girl’s dream means obtaining a higher position and achieving promotion and financial gains from work. What is the interpretation of a dream about eating cooked chicken for a single woman? Seeing her eating cooked chicken in a dream for an older girl leads to an improvement in her financial situation and a lot of nutrition in the coming period. Dreaming about cooked chicken indicates knowledge of new sources of livelihood and is a sign of abundant blessings for the dreamer. Seeing the fiancé’s girl eating grilled chicken meat leads to canceling her engagement in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about grilling chicken for unmarried women: Dreaming about grilling chicken in a virgin girl’s dream means that some developments will occur. In life it will happen for the better and it is a sign

title: Interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream Many of us are exposed to certain visions in a dream and want to see a clear interpretation of them, so we will learn together some different interpretations of the greatest scholars for clarification and different visions, as each dream or dream has its own clarification. And each social situation also has a different way of explaining, and therefore we will provide you with an interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream through a different website. Interpretation of a funeral in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream indicates the hypocrisy of people in the market, just as the funeral if it is seen In the sky, it indicates the death of a man who has a high status in society. The interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream indicates that great immorality is being committed by the people of the country in which you see the funeral, as the interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream varies from one dream to another. The funeral also shows a hypocritical man. He repents to God Almighty, or he may be lost and his covenant will end as well, as both matters appear. And whoever sees in a dream that there is no one to help transport him to the funeral, the dream indicates that this person will be imprisoned or imprisoned for the coming period, and God knows best. And whoever sees in a dream that There are many people crying in a dream over him and his funeral, so this dream indicates that the person will receive many good things soon, and God will provide him with everything he loves. Interpretation of a funeral in a dream by Ibn ShaheenIbn Shaheen says that the interpretation of seeing a funeral in a dream indicates that if If the owner of the funeral is alive in reality, he will gain a lot of goodness and happiness and will soon obtain a prominent position. But if the owner of the funeral dies, this dream indicates that the owner of the funeral is in a much better place in the world and also needs prayers and zakat from the person. And whoever sees in The dream is that he saw his funeral and no one was inside it, then the dream indicates that Almighty God will change his condition from isolation to humiliation. And whoever sees himself getting up and walking in a funeral, if he soon takes over the affairs of the bride, in addition to carrying the coffin in the dream, this indicates that the man will intercede for him In many problems in his life. Interpretation of a funeral in a dream for the elderly: Anyone who sees his funeral in a dream, the dream indicates that he will greatly regret what he lost in his life, in addition to that he will face some problems in his next life, which will make him more vulnerable to suffering. From this. Whoever sees in a dream that there are people crying for him in the dream, then the dream indicates that he will remain oppressed in his life, but soon God Almighty will correct him from this injustice in his life as well. And whoever sees that he is walking at his funeral and going down to his grave, then the dream shows He will make many mistakes and commit sins and will not abandon them, and we advise him to approach God Almighty to help someone enter the right path to God. A dream of running to a funeral. Whoever sees in a dream that he is running after a funeral, then the dream indicates that he is violating the Sunnah, and if he recognizes the dead person in the dream This indicates the condition of the dead, God willing. Whoever testifies that he is walking at the funeral with joy, the dream indicates that he will enjoy the love of God Almighty.

title: Interpretation of seeing a black crow in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a black crow in a dream: The animals in the world are diverse, in terms of shape, sizes, colors, and many characteristics that distinguish each type from the other, while the crow is one of the types of birds that can be found in many places, and the crow is distinguished by its special characteristics, as it is distinguished by its black color. There are other rare colors for it, and seeing it in a dream can be considered disturbing to many people and carries many interpretations. Interpretation of seeing a black crow in a dream: The crow is one of the animals that people are not optimistic about and are pessimistic about hearing its voice or seeing it, while seeing a black crow can come to the viewer to carry There are many people and interpretations, and they are as follows: The crow can be considered one of the birds that dreams of people different from the dreamer, according to many details in his dream. While seeing it in a man’s dream indicates his corruption and abnormal morals. Also, seeing a crow flying towards the dreamer, in a dream, may indicate To problems and troubles in his future life. Also, seeing a crow that may be on the tree is a sign of the hypocrisy of the fortuneteller’s friend in his life and he must pay attention to it. It is worth noting that the sound of the crow is one of the sounds that indicate bad news for the fortuneteller. Also, your conversation with the crow comes from dreams Different and disturbing, but it indicates the provision of a male child by the woman, but he will be a disabled child. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the crow, this was a sign of anxiety and distress for the fortuneteller, and difficulty in his life. Whoever turns into a crow in a dream indicates that he is eating illicit money. Being infected by a crow can also indicate a disease that you will contract. While a crow gives another person, a human being, praise, which indicates joy and happiness. A crow that stands in the dreamer’s dream, in a remote area of ​​the city in which he lives, indicates The death of a person. A crow entering the dreamer’s house is a sign of sustenance and abundant money in his life. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see a tumor in a dream from the most famous interpreters. A crow’s bite in a dream. The bite of many animals can be considered dangerous to the teeth and many other living organisms and is likely to cause harm. It is significant for her, while it is observed that the bite of a crow in a dream can indicate many interpretations, such as: It is an indication that the fortuneteller may feel anxious and afraid about an important matter in his life. It is also one of the signs that the dreamer will suffer from poverty in his next life. It should be noted The bite of a crow is one of the signs of conveying news by the priest, but it is fake and false news. While the bite of a crow, it can indicate hypocrisy that can characterize the dreamer. It is also a sign of bad results for making quick and inappropriate decisions. See also: Interpretation The roof of Ibn Sirin or Ibn Shaheen in detail. Seeing a crow’s nest in a dream. Many birds make different nests to protect themselves with, settle in, and lay their eggs. However, a crow’s nest in a dream is among the dreams that bring to the dreamer various indicators.

title: Interpretation of the dream of wearing gold in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wearing gold: Gold is a desirable ornament for women who want to wear it on occasions. Interpretation of a dream about wearing gold has many different visions, and it indicates good and evil. Interpretation of a dream about wearing gold for Nabulsi: Seeing an alloy of gold in a dream indicates the anger of the Sultan and the tension that befalls that person. If he sees If one sees in a dream that his house is made of gold, this indicates that he will suffer from burns from fire. If one sees in a dream that his house is made of gold, this indicates that he will suffer from burns from fire. If he gives gold, it means that he will reach a great position and may be an authority. If a person sees in his dream that his eyes are made of gold, this indicates blindness, and if his hands are made of gold, this indicates that his hands are paralyzed without movement. If a person dreams of turning gold To silver, this indicates a change in the situation from better to worse in terms of money and family. If one sees silver turning into gold, this indicates a change from lower to better in terms of family, children and money. Interpretation of a dream about wearing gold in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing gold in The dream indicates the Sultan’s anger, loss of money, or dismissal from his job. Whoever sees that he is eating gold, this indicates that he will save money for his children. Whoever sees that his house is made of gold will be struck by fire. Seeing gold in a dream is good for men and jewelry for women. Interpretation of a dream about gold In a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, seeing yourself wearing gold in a dream indicates bad luck or misfortune. Dreaming of wearing gold in a dream for a man indicates that he will be tortured with chains and shackles. Seeing gold in a dream indicates anxiety and sorrow, which is hateful and undesirable. Dreaming about wearing gold In a dream, it suggests establishing a relationship with unqualified people. Read also: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of the father’s death? Interpretation of a dream about wearing goldIn a dream about a single girl, seeing gold in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that whoever she marries will be a good man and will show kindness and blessings in her marriage and she will live Happy life. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a golden wreath, this means that she will get married soon, if she is engaged or betrothed to a good and moral man. If an unmarried girl sees that her lover offers her a golden wreath, this indicates his good faith and his offer To marry her. If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing gold and studying; This indicates that she will achieve what she wants and succeed in her studies, and if she is at work, this indicates that she will get money. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is wearing gold, this indicates the restrictions and constraints that surround her, and that she is not free, and it shows the anxiety and fear that controls her. Interpretation Dreaming of wearing gold in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman with gold in a dream portends good things in the future and happiness in the future. If a pregnant woman sees that her husband has given her gold chains, this indicates his love, that he is giving his heart to her, and that he has captured his heart and loves her very much. If she a

title: Interpretation of a dream about hearing the death of a relative

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hearing about the death of a relative. Seeing death is one of the dreams that causes intense anxiety and fear in everyone’s hearts, especially if the person is a relative and family member. However, the interpretation of a dream about the death of a relative shows many signs, some of which are good and evidence of health and blessings, and some of which are signs of death. And separation. And seeing death according to the situation in which you saw the death of a relative and according to the viewer, whether he was an unmarried young man, an unmarried girl, or a married woman. In this article, we will present the interpretation of the dream about hearing the death of a relative through the site is different. The interpretation of the dream of hearing about the death of a relative, Ibn Sirin, if the dreamer sees the death of his father In a dream, this dream indicates that the dreamer is in good health and lacks attachment in life. If the dreamer sees the death of his wife in a dream, then this dream indicates divorce. If the dreamer sees himself dead in a dream, then this dream indicates a vision of anxiety and fear of The future and severe anxiety in life. If the dreamer sees the death of one of his enemies in a dream, then this dream indicates reconciliation between them. If the dreamer sees the death of one of his friends, then this dream indicates the elimination of problems and worries. If the dreamer sees a quarrel between him and his friends in a dream, then this dream It indicates getting rid of the quarrel between them and reconciling between them. If the dreamer sees himself crying and screaming in a dream, then this dream shows the corruption of religion by achieving many positions in the world. Interpretation of the dream of hearing the death of a relative in a dream. Among Ibn Shaheen’s interpretations is the interpretation of the dream of hearing the death of a relative, and he says: If the dreamer sees the death of his son in a dream, then this dream indicates obtaining a lot of money and getting rid of life’s problems. If the dreamer sees the death of his daughter in a dream, then this dream indicates many problems and indicates failure to achieve goals in life. If he sees The dreamer’s death of his mother in a dream, then this dream indicates a serious failure in life and the inability to achieve any of the goals that the dreamer seeks in his life, and this vision means serious sadness in real life. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about visiting my friend’s house. Interpretation of a dream about hearing the death of a relative for a lonely girl if she sees If an unmarried girl sees the death of one of her relatives in her dream, then this dream indicates getting rid of problems and starting a new life for her. If an unmarried girl sees the death of her brother in her dream, then this dream indicates that she will recover a lot of money from her brother. If an unmarried girl sees the death of her brother in her dream, then this dream indicates that she will recover a lot of money from her brother. If a married woman sees in her dream the death of her sister or her father and she is screaming and crying, then this dream shows an ominous omen of illness and great sadness in your life. If an unmarried girl sees the death of one of her relatives in a dream without signs of death, washing, and shrouding, then this dream indicates the beginning of a new life that has many Praiseworthy changes for a person. Interpretation of a dream about hearing about the death of a relative for a married woman. If a married woman sees the death of her husband in her dream, then this dream indicates separation and divorce for the dreamer. If a married woman sees in her dream the death of her son without signs of death.

title: Interpretation of seeing coal in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing charcoal in a dream or dreams, and charcoal stabilizes foods and gives them a special taste, and seeing it in a dream indicates money and is very good, and it can indicate evil and acts of magic and sorcery, and cooking food on embers is a promising vision, and we will explain that in this article in detail. Interpretation of seeing coal in a dream of a man and a woman in a dream for a man, a man, a single young man, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a widow, by presenting the interpretations of the great imams in visions and dreams, ancient and modern. Follow us on the vision website. What is the interpretation of seeing coal by Ibn Sirin? Seeing coal in a man’s dream indicates To increase economic growth, abundance of money and prosperity. Seeing coal in a dream indicates suspicious money or collected from prohibited sources. Seeing unlit or unused coal indicates false and worthless actions, or that the dreamer is miserable and exhausted without compensation. Seeing pierced ashes indicates To get money from the king or sultan after fatigue and effort. What is the interpretation of seeing burning coal in a single woman’s dream? Seeing coal in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she will gain money, but through illegal means. Seeing coal ash in a dream for unmarried women means that they will fall into A big problem. Seeing buying charcoal in a dream for unmarried women means that she cares a lot about herself and spends a lot of money to decorate herself. Seeing selling charcoal to an unmarried girl indicates that she is giving wrong advice and it is not helpful to those around her. Seeing burning embers in a girl’s dream means that her marriage It is approaching. If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating charcoal, this indicates that she will achieve what she longed for and a bright future. What is the interpretation of a dream about charcoal for a married woman? Seeing charcoal in a dream for a married woman indicates the seriousness of her jealousy of her husband. If a married woman sees that she is cooking On embers, this indicates family and family bonding and excessive love between family members. If a married woman sees that her face is covered in charcoal, this indicates hatred and hatred for others, and it also indicates the pursuit of magic and sorcery. If a married woman sees that her clothes are covered in charcoal and ash, this indicates On the other hand, she puts herself in a position of doubt, discussion, and gossip. Seeing grilled meat for a married woman indicates happiness, marital stability, and family cohesion. What is the interpretation of a dream about anthrax for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees that she is extinguishing a coal flame, this indicates that she has overcome her crises and is able to Helping others. A woman who lights coal for a pregnant woman shows that she is an attractive and friendly person and loves those around her, and it also indicates good social relations. If a pregnant woman sees that she is eating coal, this indicates an easy birth. What is the interpretation of coal in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation? Seeing coal Burning means that dreams will come true. Seeing black coal denotes goodness and grace in money and goods. Seeing food cooked on coal in the dream of an unmarried young man means that soon he will be engaged to a beautiful girl. Seeing coal in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about the siwak: the meaning of seeing the siwak in a dream

preview.html: The siwak in a dream for a woman. The siwak in an unmarried woman’s dream. Interpretation of a dream about toothbrushing for a pregnant woman. The gift of toothbrushing in a dream. Giving a toothpick in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the gift of a toothpick. Interpretation of a dream about getting a gift with a brush. Interpretation of providing a toothpick in a dream. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of using the toothpick in a dream. The toothpick is a tool used to clean the teeth and has been known for a long time, our Prophet Muhammad. The Messenger of God used it regularly and cleaned his teeth and mouth with it. He also advised people to use it to clean their mouths. “If my nation had not been so harsh on my nation, I would have ordered them to use toothpicks before every prayer.” Bring it. Al-Nabulsi said: Whoever sees in a dream that he is cleaning his mouth with a toothpick, it indicates that the dreamer follows the Sunnah of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, or it indicates the man’s kindness to his family and his fulfillment of it. Financial responsibility. Whoever sees in his dream that blood comes out of his teeth after using a toothpick, this indicates the dreamer’s distance from sin and disobedience, and his closeness to the path of righteousness. Seeing a toothpick in an unmarried woman’s dream. The meaning of brushing teeth in a dream of a single man or woman is an indication of the words Kindness, good morals, or good luck that accompany a single person, and may portend the marriage of a single person, especially if the single woman sees cleanliness. And the freshness of her mouth and teeth, and you see that her laugh has become more beautiful than usual. As for seeing an unmarried girl in a dream as if she is receiving the siwak as a gift or someone is siwak for her, this portends new and happy events that will happen to her in the near future. Seeing the siwak in a married woman’s dreamSeeing a married woman She uses a toothbrush in her dream to clean her teeth and mouth, which is an indication of the collapse of worries and problems, and a married woman seeing her husband in a dream using a toothbrush is a strong indicator related to that. To material matters, as it heralds livelihood and profit and is an indication of religiosity or good deeds. As for seeing a married woman in a dream as if her husband is giving her and giving her a toothpick as a gift, this indicates a benefit she will get from him or an indication of love and friendship between them, and it is generally a good vision. Future Interpretation of brushing teeth in a pregnant woman’s dream: As for the interpretation of dreams for a pregnant woman who sees a toothpick in her dream, it is an indicator and good news for the birth of a male child, based on the fact that seeing tree branches and sticks in a dream indicates the birth of a child. Because the brush is made from a tree called arak, and only God knows what is in the wombs. The siwak in a man’s dream. There is many evidence when you see a toothbrush in a man’s dream. A warm toothbrush indicates recovery, especially when you see it in a sick man’s dream. And the man who sees in his dream that His wife gives him a toothpick or gives him a toothpick, as this portends the birth of a male child who will be a just and righteous son, God willing. Whoever sees in his dream that he is slandering you. Whoever sees the brush, this indicates his kindness to his relatives, as well as purity, and it shows marriage to a single person, and also seeing brushing teeth shows an act close to God, seeing cleaning teeth is a sign of fear
